name: PRs reviews reminder
    
on:
  schedule:
    # Every weekday every 2 hours during working hours, send notification. Blah Blah Blah
    - cron: "*/15 * * * *"

jobs:
  pr-reviews-reminder:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: davideviolante/pr-reviews-reminder-action@v1.2.0
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      with:
        webhook-url: ${{ secrets.TEAMS_WEBHOOK }}
